name: Sonder: Unknown Woes
description: Sonder. A forgotten yet incredibly thought-provoking concept, invented by the brilliant John Koenig, refers to the idea that every individual you pass on the street has a life as vivid and complex as your ow. What would happen if you had the ability to know about the lives of these people as you passed by them?  The truth is, you already do.  This very short VN, willing to break the 4th wall and go out of its way to establish its purpose, will have you questioning the actions you take during other games of its kind. Are you really in charge of the lives of your characters? This product will make you ponder.
